newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug when using a proxy to connect. * Fixed a visual bug where character tabs don't show after a failed settings restoration. * Fixed an issue where deprecated enumerations in item browser caused settings file to be flagged as corrupt. * Fixed a bug where the features menu button was not displayed if a character monitor got hidden and then re-shown. * Fixed a bug in API Tester where comma seperated ids were not regognized. * Fixed a bug in API Tester where simple corporation sheet info were not displayed when using Internal info. * Fixed a bug in API Tester where calendar event attendees were not displayed when using External info. * Fixed an issue where deprecated ToolTipNotificationBehaviour enumeration caused settings file to be flagged as corrupt. * Fixed an issue in API Tester where saving an Xml document that contains html tags leads to failure. * Fixed a crash bug when selecting to update a portrait from EVE portrait cache folder and EVE client is started in portable mode (/LUA:OFF).
== Enhancements ==
* Added ability to set up EVE clients path that are running in portable mode (/LUA:OFF). * Added ability to setup localhost endpoints in EMUU.
== Misc ==
* Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better, faster and more stable application.
